name: V1_Ch9_InvariantPreservation_Theorem
intent: Assert that all Ω-admissible operations preserve structural invariants.

constraints.closure_under_invariants: If input satisfies invariants, output must also unless explicitly flagged.
constraints.Ω_filter: Ω must reject any operation that would irreparably break invariants.
constraints.Σ_repair: Σ-based normalizations attempt repair before rejection.

cross_links.volume2_tests: Tier-00 test suite heavily uses this theorem.
